sentence: 老师让我们把作业在星期五前交上去。
meaning: hand it in (submit the homework to the teacher)

sentence: 她从地上捡起那枚硬币，小心地放进口袋。
meaning: pick it up (lift the coin from the ground)

sentence: 会议推迟到下周二举行了。
meaning: postpone it (delay the meeting to a later time)

sentence: 我们昨天沿着河边散步到了很晚。
meaning: along (following the river as you walk)

sentence: 别忘了把灯关掉再走。
meaning: turn it off (switch off the light)

sentence: 我刚才差点儿错过最后一班地铁。
meaning: almost (it nearly happened but did not)

sentence: 奶奶每天早上都去公园打太极。
meaning: practice tai chi (do the tai chi routine)

sentence: 请把这个文件发给王经理。
meaning: send it to (deliver the file to Manager Wang)

sentence: 雨突然下大了，我们赶紧找地方躲雨。
meaning: take shelter from the rain

sentence: 他把杯子放在桌角，结果被猫打翻了。
meaning: knock over (tip the cup so it spills)

sentence: 这件事情必须亲自去办才放心。
meaning: personally (do it yourself in person)

sentence: 我手机没电了，能借你的充电宝吗？
meaning: out of battery

sentence: 她把窗帘拉开，让阳光照进来。
meaning: pull open (draw the curtains apart)

sentence: 他把冰淇淋分给了每个小朋友。
meaning: distribute to (give portions to each child)

sentence: 请把你的意见写下来，我们需要参考。
meaning: write it down (record your opinions)

sentence: 考试前他把重点都复习了一遍。
meaning: key points (main focus areas to review)

sentence: 我们得提前半小时出发，免得堵车。
meaning: so as to avoid (prevent something bad)

sentence: 这条河冬天会结冰，夏天又融化。
meaning: melt (turn from ice back to water)

sentence: 她轻轻地摇了摇头。
meaning: shake her head (as a gentle no)

sentence: 航班因为大雾临时取消了。
meaning: last-minute or temporary (the cancellation happened suddenly)

sentence: 他在演讲中引用了不少经典例子。
meaning: quote (bring examples into the speech)

sentence: 小刘负责统计这一季度的销售数据。
meaning: compile statistics (count up the sales numbers)

sentence: 妈妈把热汤端上桌，让我们小心别打翻。
meaning: serve onto the table (carry the soup to the table)

sentence: 念完大学后他选择回家乡发展。
meaning: develop (build his career back home)

sentence: 地震发生时他正在熟睡。
meaning: sound asleep (deep sleep)

sentence: 请把垃圾分类扔到对应的桶里。
meaning: sort (separate trash by category)

sentence: 孩子把拼图拼成了一只大鲸鱼。
meaning: assemble into (put pieces together into a whale)

sentence: 这个菜得先把水烧开再下面。
meaning: bring to a boil (heat the water until boiling)

sentence: 他被雨淋得全身都是水。
meaning: get drenched (soaked by the rain)

sentence: 我们把地图摊开在桌子上研究路线。
meaning: spread open (lay the map flat)

sentence: 她把头发扎成了一个高马尾。
meaning: tie into (style hair into a high ponytail)

sentence: 他每天都坚持记日记。
meaning: persist (keep doing it every day)

sentence: 我把密码记在了笔记本背面。
meaning: record it at (write the password on)

sentence: 银行门口排着长长的队伍。
meaning: lined up (standing in a queue)

sentence: 她把电脑屏幕调暗了一些。
meaning: dim the screen (make the display darker)

sentence: 老师提醒我们留意发音中的声调。
meaning: pay attention (be mindful of)

sentence: 我把闹钟设在早上六点。
meaning: set for (schedule the alarm at)

sentence: 他对这份工作完全上手了。
meaning: get the hang of it (he has become comfortable doing the job)

sentence: 请把座位让给老人。
meaning: give up the seat (offer it to an elderly person)

sentence: 演唱会的门票一开售就抢光了。
meaning: snapped up instantly (tickets sold out immediately)
